title: bc端问题 如何关闭mysql
txt_content:
09:04:23 [信息] SQL is unable to create a new connection
09:04:23 [信息] Created new sql connection!
09:04:23 [严重] ????? 16, 2015 9:04:23 ???? net.md_5.bungee.event.EventBus post
????: Error dispatching event ChatEvent(super=TargetedEvent(sender=Admin117, rec
eiver=net.md_5.bungee.ServerConnection@6f3bc226), cancelled=false, message=1) to
 listener com.minecraftdimensions.bungeesuite.listeners.ChatListener@7817fd62
java.lang.NullPointerException

怎么解决

replies.author: 鸭蛋只吃黄
replies.txt_content: 麻烦把你的BC端配置文件发上来看一下
